EmailTemplate.description: Notification e-mail HTML sent when a contact with active E&F status becomes a non active contact
EmailTemplate.name: E&F_Contact Deactivation Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: E&F contact {!Contact.Name} of the account {!Account.Name} has been deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Note that this is an automatic message. Please do not respond to this email.
Dear E&F member,
Please note that the E&F contact {!Contact.Name} of the account {!Account.Name} has been deactivated (new status: {!Contact.Status__c}).
Best regards,
IATA E&F Services
